word: What are we going to do all weekend?
meaning: 우리 주말 내내 뭘 할 거야?

word: How are we going to get up?
Henry ran upstairs for his book.
They each imagined how it would look when it was done.
meaning: 그들은 각자 그것이 완성됐을 때 어떻게 보일지 상상했다.

word: He could hardly wait to finish the castle.
She was always better at thinking up ideas than finishing them.
meaning: 그녀는 아이디어를 생각해내는 것이 그것을 완성하는 것보다 항상 더 뛰어났다.
